content:
Listen to the trailer for The Intelligence, our new current-affairs podcast

THE INTELLIGENCE is a new current-affairs podcast, published every weekday from January 29th, that provides a fresh perspective on the events shaping your world. Drawing on the expertise of The Economist ’s global network of correspondents, each episode digs past the headlines to get to the stories beneath—and to stories that aren’t making headlines, but should be. For a daily burst of global illumination, you need more than just the facts. You need The Intelligence.

wp.beneath contempt: 卑鄙到了极点;卑鄙之极;有益的;卑鄙到极点的

eg2: The soil felt soft beneath our feet.
我们脚下的土踩上去很松软。
They must all be drowning  him, in the watery caves of the rock!
他们一定是在他下面的水里，就在那岩石充满了水的洞中游泳了！
The top layer should now point down to the layer .
现在，顶部图层应当有小箭头指向下面的图层。

wp.burst strength: 爆裂强度;胀破强度;耐内压强度;破裂强度
wp.burst out: 突然说出;迸发;突然起来;爆发
wp.OWNAGE BURST: 枪林弹雨;街道防守战;孤胆警探;爆裂杀手
wp.burst test: 爆破试验;爆裂试验;胀裂试验;破裂测试
wp.respiratory burst: 呼吸爆发;呼吸暴发;呼吸爆炸;呼吸爆破
wp.burst amplifier: 彩色同步脉冲放大器;彩色同步信号放大器;同步脉冲放大器;		闪光信号放大器
wp.burst mode: 三发点放;突发模式;成组方式;爆发模式
wp.burst length: 区间长度;丛发长度;突发传输周期;		突发长度
wp.Burst Transmission: 突发传输;丛发传输;脉冲串方式传输;		快速传输

eg2: The applause burst from the crowd.
人群中爆发出掌声。
A great epidemic  forth in that area.
那个地区突然发生了一场大瘟疫。
The feelings that smothered  all of a sudden.
被抑制的感情一下子爆发了。

ex: n. 记者；通讯员；通信者
网络 通讯记者；驻外记者；常驻外埠记者
eg2: the BBC's political correspondent
英国广播公司的政治新闻记者
a foreign/war/sports, etc. correspondent
驻外、战地、体育等记者
our Delhi correspondent
我们驻德里的通讯员
She's a poor correspondent(= she does not write regularly) .
她是个懒于写信的人。

ex: n. 插曲；一段情节；插话；有趣的事件

wp.Forensic expertise: 司法鉴定;违法;司法精神鉴定;法医学鉴定
wp.Teacher Expertise: 教师的专业知识;教师专门知识
wp.distributed expertise: 分散式专业知能;分散式专精知能
wp.professional expertise: 专业技能;专业经验;简称专业知能

ex: n. 专门知识；专门技术；专家的意见
eg2: This led to development organizations with bodies of expertise in these areas.
这导致了在这些领域的具有专门技术的开发组织。
It is not like I came into this country (on my own). They called me into this country for my .
不像我（完全靠自己）来到这个国家，而是他们因为我的专业技能而找我来的。
Though forged fingerprints are rare, he says, a person with expertise could produce one with a rubber stamp, or even with an engraving made from a photograph of a fingerprint.
虽然伪造指纹非常罕见，但他说一个具有专门知识的人能用橡皮图章做出一枚指纹，或根据一张指纹的照片雕刻出一枚来。

ex: n. 照明；启示；灯饰；启迪
网络 照度；光照；启发
eg2: The only illumination in the room came from the fire.
屋子里唯一的光亮来自炉火。
Christmas illuminations
圣诞节的彩灯
spiritual illumination
精神上的启发

wp.Perspective Shadow: 透视投影;透视阴影;斜影效果滤镜;斜影
wp.functional perspective: 功能观点;功能观;功能视角;金融功能观
wp.Perspective Mode: 透视图模式;透视图形式
wp.architectural perspective: 建筑透视;建筑透视图;建筑摄影

eg2: The Table 1 below gives some perspective of this.
下面的表格1 给出了这个的一些观点。
There is much that might be said about friendships. They allow us to see ourselves from the perspective of another.
关于友谊的说法可能有很多种，这使得我们能从别人的观点里看到我们自己。
You specify an extension point for each of your applications, so the workbench can correctly launch the  for your application.
为每个应用程序指定一个扩展点，这样工作台就能够正确地启动应用程序的透视图。

ex: n. 挂车；拖车；活动工作室；（电影或电视节目的）预告片
网络 追踪者；尾部；电影预告片
eg2: a car towing a trailer with a boat on it
拖着一辆载有小船的拖车的小汽车
a trailer park(= an area where trailers are parked and used as homes)
拖车式活动房屋停车场

Title: The Economist’s new daily podcast launches on January 29th
